text:
Hi there, I am trying to get bitbucket pipelines to work with HubSpot and I have done my best to copy what others have done in here. Like this bitbucket-pipelines.yml file:
```pipelines:
  branches:
    master:
      - step:
          name: 'Install NPM deps'
          caches:
             - node
          script:
            - npm install
      - step:
          name: 'Deploy'
          caches:
             - node
          script:
            - bin/generate-config.js
            - bin/deploy.sh```
I am getting an error saying that npx command is not found in the deploy.sh step. Any insight here would be greatly appreciated. Thanks!
Is this kind of like github actions? I can share that script if it's helpful. Doesn't look like a 1:1 but it's similar
It is supposed to be similar but I am not an expert at Bitbucket so I am gonna guess someone would else would know more.
